categories.name: Inkjet Media
categories.description: Indoor papers and films for high quality prints

categories.name: Solvent Media
categories.description: Durable outdoor vinyl for signage and wraps

products.name: Bond Paper
products.description: A standard uncoated 80gsm paper used to print cad drawings, landscaping plans, blueprints and templates. Bond paper is acid-free and won’t yellow over time. Fits most large-format printers and engineering copiers.

products.name: Coated Paper
products.description: A matt white coated paper which has a special inkjet coating to allow the ink not to bleed in order to produce very sharp images. For indoor poster use.

products.name: Enhanced Coated Paper
products.description: Premium coated paper optimized for higher color gamut, sharper detail and faster drying. Ideal for premium indoor posters and proofing.

products.name: Photo Paper
products.description: A very high quality resin coated paper used for photographic reproduction. Excellent colour gamut, vivid images.

products.name: Polyester Canvas (Canvas Light)
products.description: A good quality polyester/cotton blended canvas with an inkjet coating. Used to print photographic and art reproductions. Can be stretched over a frame without the edges cracking.

products.name: Cotton Canvas (Classic Canvas)
products.description: An exceptional quality pure cotton canvas with an inkjet coating. Used to print photographic and art reproductions. Can be stretched over a frame without the edges cracking.

products.name: Self-Adhesive Vinyl (Inkjet)
products.description: Multipurpose self-adhesive vinyl for indoor graphics and short-term signage. Optimized for inkjet with clean, vivid print quality.

products.name: Matt Vinyl
products.description: Durable outdoor vinyl with a matt finish. Perfect for signage and wraps.

products.name: Gloss Vinyl
products.description: High-gloss outdoor vinyl for vibrant signage and vehicle wraps.

products.name: Cast Vinyl
products.description: Premium cast vinyl for vehicle wraps and complex curved surfaces.

products.name: Blockout PVC
products.description: A high-strength laminated flex (1000 x 1000 DIN) designed for outdoor use for billboards and banners. The black back gives 100% opacity so if the sun shines from behind, it does not interfere with the image printed on it.

products.name: DTF Film
products.description: Direct-to-Film transfer film for garment printing. No weeding required.

products.name: DTF Powder
products.description: Hot-melt adhesive powder for DTF transfers. Creates durable bond with fabrics.

products.name: Gloss Lamination
products.description: Crystal clear gloss laminate for print protection and enhancement. UV resistant with excellent clarity.

products.name: Matt Lamination
products.description: Anti-glare matt laminate for professional finish without reflections. Perfect for indoor displays and posters.

products.name: Mounting Adhesive
products.description: Double-sided adhesive film for mounting prints to rigid substrates.

products.name: Double-sided Mounting Film
products.description: A clear polyester mounting film, coated on both sides with a permanent pressure sensitive acrylic adhesive, one of which is protected by a Kraft siliconized release liner and one side a film release liner. The perfect product for the mounting of graphics onto various substrates such as correx etc.

products.name: Optically Clear Double-sided Mounting Film
products.description: A 100% optically transparent polyester film. Both sides of the film have a high-viscosity solvent-acrylic adhesive that are protected by a clear film lining. Used for special applications that require full clarity, such as mounting a print to acrylic or glass.
